description: This file defines a React client-side page component for handling Confluence login redirection within a Next.js application. It performs a client-side redirect to an OAuth login endpoint, passing through existing query parameters.

methods.name: ConfluenceLoginRedirectPage
methods.description: React functional component rendering a Suspense fallback and invoking RedirectWorker for redirection.

methods.name: RedirectWorker
methods.description: Handles the redirect logic to the OAuth login endpoint by constructing the URL and performing window.location.replace.
